column4: can i install ebox to manage squid when squid has already been installed on the box earlier. and its still running
I think so, yes.. I don't think squid needs to be restarted.
i've tried that before. but when i login to ebox, the cache is grayed. and i can't manage the squid
might be something else that is wrong then.. or I've misunderstood how ebox works. I've only tried it once or twice
